00069 void Serve()
00070 {
00071     try {
00072         Netxx::Address address;
00073         Netxx::Timeout timeout(10);
00074         address.add_all_addresses(7000);
00075 
00076         Netxx::StreamServer server(address, timeout);
00077 
00078         char buffer[1024];
00079 
00080         for (;;) {
00081             Netxx::Peer client = server.accept_connection();
00082 
00083             if (!client) {
00084                 std::cout << ": timeout waiting for connection" << std::endl;
00085                 continue;
00086             }
00087 
00088             Netxx::Stream client_stream(client.get_socketfd(), timeout);
00089             Netxx::signed_size_type bytes_read;
00090             Netxx::Netbuf<1024> sbuf(client_stream);
00091             std::iostream stream(&sbuf);
00092             std::string string_buffer;
00093         
00094             std::cout << ": connection from " << client << std::endl;
00095             while ((bytes_read = client_stream.read(buffer, sizeof(buffer))))
00096             {
00097                 Propagate();
00098                 stream << myOrbit->GetStateObject().GetStateRepresentation()->GetPositionVelocity() << std::endl;
00099             }
00100             std::cout << ": client disconnected from server" << std::endl;
00101         }
00102     } catch (std::exception &e) {
00103         std::cerr << ": " << e.what() << std::endl;
00104         return 1;
00105     }
00106 }

00108 void DisplayOrbit()
00109 {
00110     if(myOrbit->IsIntegrateable())
00111         cout << "Orbit State (km, km/s): " << ~myOrbit->GetStateObject().GetStateRepresentation()->GetPositionVelocity() << endl;
00112     else
00113         cout << "Orbit State: [ uninitialized ]" << endl;
00114     return;
00115 }

00118 {
00119     if(myAttitude->IsIntegrateable())
00120         cout << "Attitude State: (-, rad/s)" << ~myAttitude->GetStateObject().GetState() << endl;
00121     else
00122         cout << "Attitude State: [ uninitialized ]" << endl;
00123     return;
00124 }
00125 void DisplayPropagator()
00126 {
00127     if(myPropagator)
00128         cout << "Propagate times: [" << propTimes[0] << " -> " << propTimes[1] <<  "] (s)" << endl;
00129     else
00130         cout << "Propagate State: [ uninitialized ]" << endl;
00131     return;

00133 int DisplayMenu()
00134 {
00135     DisplayOrbit();
00136     DisplayAttitude();
00137     DisplayPropagator();
00138     cout << endl;
00139     cout << "[1] Setup Orbit" << endl;
00140     cout << "[2] Setup Orbit Integrator" << endl;
00141     cout << "[3] Setup Attitude" << endl;
00142     cout << "[4] Setup Attitude Integrator" << endl;
00143     cout << "[5] Setup Environment" << endl;
00144     cout << "[6] Setup Propagator" << endl;
00145     cout << "[7] Serve" << endl;
00146     cout << "[8] Plot" << endl;
00147     cout << "[0] Exit" << endl;
00148     cout << endl << "Selection: " << flush;
00149     
00150     int selection;
00151     cin >> selection;
00152     return selection;
00153 }

00155 void Select()
00156 {
00157     switch(DisplayMenu())
00158     {
00159         case 1: // ChangeOrbit
00160             ChangeOrbit();
00161             break;
00162         case 2:
00163             ChangePropagator();
00164             //ChangeOrbitIntegrator();
00165             break;
00166         case 3: 
00167             ChangeAttitude();
00168             break;
00169         case 4:
00170             ChangePropagator();
00171             //ChangeAttitudeIntegrator();
00172             break;
00173         case 5:
00174             ChangeEnvironment();
00175             break;
00176         case 6:
00177             ChangePropagator();
00178             break;
00179         case 7:
00180             Serve();
00181             break;
00182         case 8:
00183             ::Plot();
00184             break;
00185         case 0:
00186             return;
00187             break;
00188         default:
00189             cout << "Incorrect Selection." << endl;
00190             break;
00191     }
00192     Select();
00193 
00194 }
00195 int main()
00196 {
00197     SetupOrbit();
00198     SetupAttitude();
00199     SetupPropagator();
00200     myOrbit->SetPropagator(myPropagator);
00201     myAttitude->SetPropagator(myPropagator);
00202 
00203     SetupEnvironment();
00204     myOrbit->SetEnvironment(myEnvironment);
00205     myAttitude->SetEnvironment(myEnvironment);
00206    
00207    Select(); 
00208     // Store the output to file
00209     ofstream ofile;
00210 
00211     if(myOrbit)
00212         if (myOrbit->IsIntegrateable())
00213         {
00214             ofile.open("OrbitHistory.dat");
00215             ofile << setprecision(15) << myOrbit->GetHistory().GetHistory();
00216             ofile.close();
00217         }
00218     
00219     if(myAttitude)
00220         if (myAttitude->IsIntegrateable())
00221         {
00222             ofile.open("AttitudeHistory.dat");
00223             ofile << setprecision(15) << myAttitude->GetHistory().GetHistory();
00224             ofile.close();
00225         }
00226     return 0;
00227                             
00228 }

00230 void Plot()
00231 {
00232     if(myOrbit)
00233         if (myOrbit->IsIntegrateable())
00234         {
00235             Matrix orbitHistory = myOrbit->GetHistory().GetHistory();
00236             Matrix orbitPlotting = orbitHistory(_,_(MatrixIndexBase+1,MatrixIndexBase+3));
00237             Plot3D(orbitPlotting);
00238         }
00239     if(myAttitude)
00240         if (myAttitude->IsIntegrateable())
00241         {
00242             Matrix attitudeHistory = myAttitude->GetHistory().GetHistory();
00243             Matrix attitudePlotting = attitudeHistory(_,_(MatrixIndexBase,MatrixIndexBase+4));
00244             Plot2D(attitudePlotting);
00245         }
00246 
00247 }
00248 
00249 void Propagate()
00250 {
00251 
00252     cout << "PropTime = " << propTimes[0].GetSeconds() << " s -> " << propTimes[1].GetSeconds() << " s" << endl;
00253     cout << "Orbit State: " << ~myOrbit->GetStateObject().GetState() << endl;
00254     cout << "Attitude State: " << ~myAttitude->GetStateObject().GetState() << endl;
00255 
00256     // Integrate over the desired time interval
00257     tick();
00258     myPropagator->Propagate(propTimes, myOrbit->GetStateObject().GetState(), myAttitude->GetStateObject().GetState());
00259     ssfSeconds calcTime = tock();
00260     cout << "finished propagating in " << calcTime << " seconds." << endl;
00261 }

00265 void SetupEnvironment()
00266 {
00267     // ENVIRONMENT TESTING
00268     myEnvironment = new Environment;
00269     EarthCentralBody *pCBEarth = new EarthCentralBody;
00270     myEnvironment->SetCentralBody(pCBEarth);
00271 
00272     return;
00273 }
00274 void ChangeEnvironment()
00275 {
00276     // Add Gravity force function
00277     cout << "Filling Parameters" << endl;
00278     EnvFunction TwoBodyGravity(&GravityForceFunction);
00279     myEnvironment->AddForceFunction(TwoBodyGravity);
00280     
00281     cout << "Add Drag? (y or n): " << flush;
00282     char answer;
00283     cin >> answer;
00284     if(answer == 'y')
00285     {
00286         // Add Drag Force Function
00287         EnvFunction DragForce(&SimpleAerodynamicDragForce);
00288         double *BC = new double(200);
00289         DragForce.AddParameter(reinterpret_cast<void*>(BC), 1);
00290         double *rho = new double(1.13 * pow(static_cast<double>(10), static_cast<double>(-12))); // kg/m^3
00291         DragForce.AddParameter(reinterpret_cast<void*>(rho), 2);
00292         myEnvironment->AddForceFunction(DragForce);
00293     }
00294     cout << "Finished Setting up Earth Environment" << endl;
00295        
00296     // Adds a controller
00297     EnvFunction Controller(&SimpleController);
00298     Vector* Gains = new Vector(3);
00299     cout << "Input Control gains: "<< flush;
00300     cin >> (*Gains)(1);
00301     cin >> (*Gains)(2);
00302     cin >> (*Gains)(3);
00303     
00304     Controller.AddParameter(reinterpret_cast<void*>(Gains),1);
00305     myEnvironment->AddTorqueFunction(Controller);    
00306     return;
00307 }

00309 // *************************
00310 // ****** PROPAGATOR *******

00312 void SetupPropagator()
00313 {
00314     myPropagator = new CombinedNumericPropagator;
00315     orbitIntegrator = new RungeKuttaIntegrator;
00316     attitudeIntegrator = new RungeKuttaIntegrator;
00317         
00318     myPropagator->SetOrbitIntegrator(orbitIntegrator);
00319     myPropagator->SetAttitudeIntegrator(attitudeIntegrator);
00320     
00321     myPropagator->SetOrbitStateConversion(&myOrbitStateConvFunc);
00322     myPropagator->SetAttitudeStateConversion(&myAttitudeStateConvFunc);
00323     
00324     // Integration Times
00325     double intTime = 1;
00326     ssfTime begin(0);
00327     ssfTime end(begin + intTime);
00328     propTimes.push_back(begin);
00329     propTimes.push_back(end);
00330     return;
00331 }
00332 
00333 void ChangePropagator()
00334 {
00335     DisplayPropagator();
00336     
00337     // Create & setup the integator
00338         // Setup an integrator and any special parameters
00339     int stepSize = 1;
00340 
00341     // Integration Times
00342     double intTime = 1;
00343     cout << "Integration duration (s): " << flush;
00344     cin >> intTime;
00345       
00346     cout << "Orbit Integration Stepsize (s): "<< flush;
00347     cin >> stepSize;
00348     orbitIntegrator->SetNumSteps(floor(intTime/stepSize));
00349 
00350     cout << "Attitude Integration Stepsize(s): "<< flush;
00351     cin >> stepSize;
00352     attitudeIntegrator->SetNumSteps(floor(intTime/stepSize));
00353     
00354     ssfTime begin(0);
00355     ssfTime end(begin + intTime);
00356     propTimes[0] = begin;
00357     propTimes[1] = end;
00358 }

00362 void myOrbitStateConvFunc(const Matrix &_meshPoint, OrbitState &_convertedOrbitState)
00363 {
00364     static Vector tempVector(_meshPoint[MatrixColsIndex].getIndexBound() - 1);
00365     tempVector(_) = ~_meshPoint(_,_(MatrixIndexBase+1, _meshPoint[MatrixColsIndex].getIndexBound()));
00366     _convertedOrbitState.SetState(tempVector);
00367     return;
00368 }

00370 void ChangeOrbit()
00371 {
00372     DisplayOrbit();
00373     
00374     // Create & initialize the orbit
00375     OrbitState myOrbitState;
00376     myOrbitState.SetStateRepresentation(new PositionVelocity);
00377     myOrbitState.SetOrbitFrame(new OrbitFrameIJK);
00378     Vector initPV(6);
00379     //-5776.6 -157 3496.9
00380     // -2.595 -5.651 -4.513
00381         cout << "Enter the position vector (km): " << flush;
00382         cin >> initPV(VectorIndexBase+0); // km
00383         cin >> initPV(VectorIndexBase+1); // km
00384         cin >> initPV(VectorIndexBase+2); // km
00385         cout << "Enter the velocity vector (km): " << flush;
00386         cin >> initPV(VectorIndexBase+3); // km
00387         cin >> initPV(VectorIndexBase+4); // km
00388         cin >> initPV(VectorIndexBase+5); // km
00389     myOrbitState.SetState(initPV);
00390     myOrbit->SetStateObject(myOrbitState);
00391     
00392 //    cout << "Choose the dynamics equation: " << flush;
00393     myOrbit->SetDynamicsEq(&TwoBodyDynamics);
00394     
00395     // Setup Parameters (ie mass, etc)
00396     return;
00397 }
00398 void SetupOrbit()
00399 {
00400     myOrbit = new Orbit;
00401     return;
00402 }

00405 // *************************
00406 // ******* ATTITUDE ******** 
00407 // ************************* 
00408 void myAttitudeStateConvFunc(const Matrix &_meshPoint, AttitudeState &_convertedAttitudeState)
00409 {
00410     static Vector tempQ(4); tempQ(_) = ~_meshPoint(_,_(2, 5));
00411     static Vector tempVector(3); tempVector(_) = ~_meshPoint(1, _(6, 8));
00412     _convertedAttitudeState.SetState(Rotation(Quaternion(tempQ)), tempVector);
00413     return;
00414 }
00415 static Vector AttituteDynamics(const ssfTime &_time, const Vector& _integratingState, Orbit *_Orbit, Attitude *_Attitude, const Matrix &_parameters, const Functor &_forceFunctorPtr)
00416 {
00417     static Vector stateDot(7);
00418     static Matrix bMOI(3,3); 
00419     static Matrix qtemp(4,3); 
00420     static Matrix Tmoment(3,1);
00421     static Vector qIn(4); 
00422     static Vector wIn(3);
00423     qIn = _integratingState(_(VectorIndexBase,VectorIndexBase + 3));
00424     wIn = _integratingState(_(VectorIndexBase + 4,VectorIndexBase + 6));
00425     qIn /= norm2(qIn);
00426 
00427 //    _attitudeState->SetState(Rotation(Quaternion(qIn)), wIn);  // Need to speed up in some way
00428     qtemp(_(VectorIndexBase+0,VectorIndexBase+2),_(VectorIndexBase+0,VectorIndexBase+2)) = skew(qIn(_(VectorIndexBase+0,VectorIndexBase+2))) + qIn(VectorIndexBase+3) * eye(3);
00429     qtemp(VectorIndexBase+3, _(VectorIndexBase+0,VectorIndexBase+2)) = -(~qIn(_(VectorIndexBase+0,VectorIndexBase+2)));
00430     qtemp(_,MatrixIndexBase) = 0.5 * qtemp * wIn;
00431 
00432     bMOI = _parameters(_(MatrixIndexBase+0,MatrixIndexBase+2),_(MatrixIndexBase+0,MatrixIndexBase+2));
00433     Tmoment(_,_) = (_forceFunctorPtr.Call(_time, _Orbit->GetStateObject(), _Attitude->GetStateObject()))(_);
00434     Tmoment = (bMOI.inverse() * (Tmoment - skew(wIn) * (bMOI * wIn)));
00435     
00436     stateDot(_(VectorIndexBase,VectorIndexBase + 3)) = qtemp(_,MatrixIndexBase);
00437     stateDot(_(VectorIndexBase + 4,VectorIndexBase + 6)) = Tmoment(_,MatrixIndexBase);
00438 
00439     return stateDot;
00440 }

00442 void ChangeAttitude()
00443 {
00444     DisplayAttitude();
00445     double q1,q2,q3,q4;
00446     cout << "Enter Attitude quaternion: " << flush;
00447     cin >> q1 >> q2 >> q3 >> q4;
00448     
00449     AttitudeState myAttitudeState;
00450     myAttitudeState.SetRotation(Rotation(Quaternion(q1,q2,q3,q4)));
00451 
00452     cout << "Enter Attitude angular velocity (rad/s): " << flush;
00453     cin >> q1 >> q2 >> q3;
00454     Vector initAngVelVector(3);
00455         initAngVelVector(1) = q1;
00456         initAngVelVector(2) = q2;
00457         initAngVelVector(3) = q3;
00458         
00459     myAttitudeState.SetAngularVelocity(initAngVelVector);
00460 
00461     myAttitude->SetStateObject(myAttitudeState);
00462     myAttitude->SetDynamicsEq(&AttituteDynamics);
00463     myAttitude->SetParameters(eye(3));
00464     
00465     return;
00466 }
00467 void SetupAttitude()
00468 {
00469     myAttitude = new Attitude;
00470     
00471     return;
